reviews.text: We have stayed several times at Dotonbori Hotel, most recently in April 2012. The hotel has an excellent location only minutes away from the famous neon lights around Dotonbori. The hotel is also very affordable. We usually make this our final stay on our Japan travels whenever we need to catch a morning flight out from Kansai airport.
reviews.title: Exceptional business hotel in great location

reviews.text: You will get a small but spotlessly clean room. There are also many great extras including free internet, free international calls, free laptop rental, free bicycle rental and much more.
reviews.title: Great location, incredible value.

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed May 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The hotel is a standard Japanese business hotel but clearly one with a big heart.
reviews.title: Great value and location

reviews.text: We will come back.
reviews.title: Best Hotel!!!!

reviews.text: I recently had a 2 night stay at the Dotonbori hotel. The location was great, with very clear instructions provided on their website. Located very near Namba station in osaka, with the aid of the station maps it only took me a short while to make my way from the Nankai station to exit 25, then another 3 minutes walk to the hotel, on the quieter end on Dotonbori Street. The rate I got in advance was around 7000 yen per night for a single room which was great value.
reviews.title: BEST LOCATION in Osaka for eating and shopping!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed April 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: During the last week of April, my wife and I stayed at the Dotonbori Hotel for one night in the small double room for about $115/night.
reviews.title: Great amenities and location

reviews.text: We all know Japan’s reputation for small hotel rooms, but this double on the sixth floor was adequately sized. We had no difficulty moving around the room (granted my wife and I aren’t big). The room was good and clean. The bed was comfortable and the shower had good water pressure.
reviews.title: best location, great value for money

reviews.text: Service was very good. The hotel staff were all friendly and accommodating.
reviews.title: Great location, decent room and plenty of amenities

reviews.text: Amenity-wise, the hotel was excellent. Wired LAN and wifi internet is available in the room for free. You can also rent a laptop for free. They offer discount coupons for some of the surrounding restaurants. The lobby also has wifi and computers with free internet and printer use. The lobby also provides free international calls (first five minutes) and beverages for guests. Another free amenity: bicycle rental.
reviews.title: Good value and excellent location

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed February 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Another benefit of this hotel is its location. It’s located near the heart of Osaka’s Dotonbori/Shinsaibashi area. The famous mechanical crab and Glico billboard is less than a 10 minute walk away. Namba station is also less than 10 minutes away.
reviews.title: Great Location

reviews.text: As a couple, we had the pillar room and were pleased that we did. There were two large single beds with a big pillar in between which, if anything, forced the hotel into allowing extra space for that room. The bathroom is a capsule which was quite adequate, and in general, we found the room very comfortable. The staff and services were top notch. The location was excellent - a two minute walk down the street to the arcade strip of shops, restaurants, cafes, markets, - and a ten minute walk around the corner to the main railway station.
reviews.title: Great value and convenience

reviews.text: This hotel ticks all the boxes.
reviews.title: Great service & facilities but a little hard to locate!

reviews.text: The hotel is in the heart of Dotonbori and a great location, but I find it a little hard to locate amidst the rows and rows of similar hotels and streets! Tip: Check the nearest subway exit number! Nonetheless, I was impressed by its facilities such as laptop loan, free home calls, free printing and free beverages at the lobby. There are also events for the guests though I did not get to attend it as I was out for the day. I like the quirky and vibrant Osaka and will be back for more!
reviews.title: Excellent Hotel

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed August 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The hotel was located right in the heart of restaurant, shopping and entertainment. We checked in as a family with kids and everyone loves the hotel. The service was excellent. It seemed that they have tried few extra miles to pamper their guests with so many free gifts and good service. The room was quite big for average 3 stars hotel in Japan and it was clean. If you came from Tokyo by shinkansen like us, take Midosuji line from Shin Osaka (M 13) to Namba (M 20) and find exit 25. After exit make U turn to find Mc Donald walk straight until you find Yoshinoya at the corner, turn left and walk straight, find the hotel on the left side opposite of Lawson. If you carry some big suitcases, on the way to exit 25, around 20 meters before exit 25, on the right hand side (exit 15 if I am not mistaken) take the elevator there and you will be on the street level in Namba Hips Mall. Just walk across the street and there was actually the spot if you took exit 25. From there just follow the instruction as if you chose exit 25.
reviews.title: Brilliant!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed May 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: I stayed at the Dotonbori Hotel for 4 nights on a 2 1/2 week trip to Japan and found it to be the most quaint and accessible hotel of my whole trip. Situated only moments away from the Dotonbori main strip gives ample opportunity to explore the seemingly endless restaurants, bars, shops and attractions this part of Japan has to offer. Amongst all the lights and noise and people I found it near on impossible to get lost.
reviews.title: Great hotel in the heart of dotonbori

reviews.text: Although rooms are small (but normal by Japanese standards), Dotonbori provides many freebies.
reviews.title: Dotonbori offers many extras.

reviews.text: For those who don't lag their PCs around when they travel, they over free loan of PCs from counter to take up to the room. Each room has independent wifi, so no problems connecting to the Net.
reviews.title: Nice hotel in great location
